column4: with mesa-utils installed you can run: glxinfo | grep [Dd]irect
you should see: ":direct rendering: Yes" if it's supported
so if I see direct rendering yes then I have 3d?
so if I see "direct rendering: Yes
server glx vendor string: ATI
server glx version string: 1.4
does that mean I have 3d with the properity driver
if glxinfo returns direct rendering: Yes then you have 3D support (IIRC).  You can try running glxgears to confirm
